description: Recommended external skills for the boilerplate. Self-improving: periodically checked for updates.

superpowers.description: Core skills library - TDD, debugging, planning, collaboration

awesome-claude-skills.description: Curated list of Claude skills, resources, tools

awesome-claude-code.description: Commands, CLAUDE.md files, CLI tools, workflows

tdd-guard.description: Automated TDD enforcement for Claude Code

recommended.name: superpowers:writing-skills
recommended.description: TDD approach to skill creation - test with subagents before deployment
recommended.why: Ensures skills work under pressure and resist rationalization

recommended.name: superpowers:testing-skills-with-subagents
recommended.why: Validates skills actually change behavior before deployment

recommended.name: superpowers:test-driven-development
recommended.description: Write test first, watch fail, write code, watch pass
recommended.why: Ensures tests verify behavior by requiring failure first

recommended.name: superpowers:systematic-debugging
recommended.description: Four-phase debugging: root cause, patterns, hypothesis, implementation
recommended.why: Prevents guessing - requires understanding before fixing

recommended.name: superpowers:brainstorming
recommended.description: Refine ideas through questioning before implementation
recommended.why: Prevents jumping to code before design is solid

recommended.name: superpowers:verification-before-completion
recommended.description: Run verification and confirm output before claiming success
recommended.why: Evidence before assertions - prevents false completion claims

recommended.name: superpowers:requesting-code-review
recommended.description: Dispatch code reviewer after completing major features

recommended.name: superpowers:root-cause-tracing
recommended.description: Trace bugs backward through call stack to source

boilerplate_skills.name: guardian-agents
boilerplate_skills.notes: Core orchestration - needs test scenarios for guardian dispatch

boilerplate_skills.name: session-management
boilerplate_skills.notes: Greeting scenarios, edge cases for missing context

boilerplate_skills.name: boilerplate-sync
boilerplate_skills.notes: Merge conflict scenarios, upstream candidate validation
